Quels sont les grands principes de la st: What are the main principles of the COVID-19 vaccination strategy?
La Tunisie s’est fixé les principes suiv: Tunisia has set itself the following principles:
Un accès équitable pour des vaccins grat: Equitable access for free, effective, safe and quality vaccines approved by scientific data in a timely manner
Une prise de décision personnelle basée: Personal decision-making based on transparent and understandable data
Comment s’enregistrer pour la vaccinatio: How to register for the Covid-19 vaccination?
Quels sont les objectifs de la vaccinati: What are the goals of vaccination?
Le premier objectif de la vaccination, c: The first goal of vaccination is to reduce the number of severe forms of COVID-19.
Les résultats des études cliniques des c: The results of clinical studies of vaccine candidates seem to converge to demonstrate one main fact: vaccination can massively reduce mortality due to the virus and its severe forms.
La vaccination contre la Covid-19 sera-t: Will the vaccination against Covid-19 be free?
La vaccination sera gratuite pour tous e: Vaccination will be free for everyone in Tunisia, but according to the priority established by the authorities.
Il y aura environ 200 centres de vaccina: There will be about 200 vaccination centers in order to :
1 à 2 grand (s) centre(s) par gouvernora: 1 to 2 large center (s) per governorate open all week And one center per delegation to be identified by regional health directorate open on weekends.
Que faire en cas de problème lors de l'i: What to do in case of a problem during registration?
Un numéro vert gratuit a été mis en plac: A free toll-free number has been set up to support citizens throughout the vaccination campaign.
Le numéro vert : 80102021, ouvert du lun: The toll-free number: 80102021, open Monday to Friday from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.
